title: The Winklevoss' bitcoin exchange is pushing into banking with a new savings product
description: Gemini is adding a new service called "Earn" that lets clients move their holdings in bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies into interest-bearing accounts.
keywords: Wall Street, Banks, Cryptocurrency, Markets, Internet, Technology, Bitcoin/USD Coinbase, Ether/USD, Litecoin/USD, business news
snippet:
Gemini, the cryptocurrency exchange founded by Tyler and Cameron Winklevoss, is launching a savings scheme for its U.S. users.
